sdata.j: ↑会社↑↓かいしゃ↓の|↑支配人|↑↓しはいにん↓がその↑新↑↓あたら↓しいタイピストに、どこで↑仕事↑↓しごと↓をし、↑何↑↓なに↓をするべきか↑説明↑↓せつめい↓した。

sdata.e: After fifteen years at a building firm, Bill Pearson was given the responsible position of area manager.

sdata.e: After John became manager, he told me he would never have expected to reach such a high position.

sdata.e: After John became manager, he told me he would never have expected to reach such a high position.
